thread.title: Anushka Sharma Aces The Tonal Trend
thread.title_full: Anushka Sharma Aces The Tonal Trend

author: Hrishitaa Sharma
title: Anushka Sharma Aces The Tonal Trend
text:
Hrishitaa Sharma Mar . 20 . 2017 Anushka Sharma 
Like all-black dressing, you can never go wrong with tonal dressing. The trend to wear one colour on top as well as the bottom is taking over and weâ€™re absolutely loving it. From a pant-shirt combo to a skirt-top combo, this trend is such a chic one. 
Doing full justice to the style shift, Anushka Sharma wears a navy blue shirt-pant number from Emporio Armani. Celebrity stylist Allia Al Rufai accessorises the look with a pair of tan heels from Christian Louboutin . Anushka Sharma
